page.title: 18Shopping on Shoreham Beach
page.content: adequate.3 people said that the shops were not satifactory. When we asked them where they shopped for larger items they said that they went to Brighton or Worthing The prices in the shops are fairly cheap and because they are close at hand the older generation can reach them easily. From a shop count in the High Street one can see that most of the shops fall into 2 of the 3 categories, convenience and specialist shops.As a result Shoreham does not provide its inhabitants with a lot of choice. The peoples attitudes towards the shops is that Shoreham only provides them with basic needs.This causes them to shop in larger towns like Brighton.
